userStories.title: Schema v2: USD minor units + terminology normalization
userStories.description: As an integrator, I want v2 schemas using USD minor-unit strings and proof-tier naming so that services and OpenClaw integrations share deterministic contracts.
acceptanceCriteria: New v2 schemas added with new $id values; strict additionalProperties:false
All monetary fields are string integers in minor units
Add min_proof_tier enum (self|gateway|sandbox) and mark min_poh_tier as legacy
userStories.notes: Added v2 schema files for bounties + escrow using USD-only currency and integer-string minor-unit fields (e.g. amount_minor). Introduced min_proof_tier enum (self|gateway|sandbox) and marked legacy min_poh_tier as deprecated.

userStories.title: Identity rotation schema + golden vector fixture
userStories.description: As a verifier/integrator, I want a standard DID rotation certificate schema and an authoritative golden vector fixture so identity primitives are testable and cross-implementation compatible.
acceptanceCriteria: Add packages/schema/identity/did_rotation.v1.json with new $id and strict additionalProperties:false
Add packages/schema/fixtures/protocol-m-golden-vector.v1.json as a stable test vector reference
Update packages/schema/README.md to list the new identity schema
JSON files are valid (draft 2020-12 for schema)
userStories.notes: Added did_rotation v1 schema and imported the Protocol M golden vector as a fixture for automated verification tests.
